perturbation.original_text: All Information collected under this Agreement will be transmitted between the parties in a manner to be mutually agreed upon.
perturbation.changed_text: All Information collected under this Agreement will be transmitted between the parties in a manner determined solely by Excite@Home.
perturbation.explanation: The original text requires mutual agreement on the data transmission method, ensuring both parties are satisfied. The modified version gives Excite@Home unilateral control, potentially disadvantaging e-centives and creating a conflict of interest since how data is sent will affect both parties but only one gets to choose.

perturbation.original_text: During the first year of the Agreement a persistent "Above-the-Fold" link shall remain present in the Excite@Home Shopping content area, or its subsequent replacement, or an equivalent area as determined by Excite@Home, that directs end users to the Co-Branded Application, the phrasing of which shall be mutually agreed upon. "Above-the-Fold" shall mean in a position generally viewable by an end-user customer using an Internet browser which has been maximized to full screen on a computer displaying a minimum resolution of 600 x 800 dpi or higher.
perturbation.changed_text: During the first year of the Agreement a persistent link shall remain present in the Excite@Home Shopping content area, or its subsequent replacement, or an area Excite@Home deems appropriate, that directs end users to the Co-Branded Application, the phrasing of which will be determined by Excite@Home. The placement of the link and the definition of a 'persistent' link is the sole discretion of Excite@Home.
perturbation.explanation: The original text defines a prominent placement ('Above-the-Fold' as specifically defined) and requires mutual agreement on the link's phrasing. The modified text removes the specific placement, allows Excite@Home to determine what is 'appropriate' (making it more vague), dictates the phrasing, and puts link persistence completely under Excite@Home's control. This creates a contradiction as the original implied a more prominent and mutually agreed-upon promotion while the modified version allows for minimal and unilaterally controlled promotion by Excite@Home.

perturbation.original_text: Excite@Home will provide promotion for the Co-Branded Application as described in EXHIBIT F. Excite@Home may provide additional links to, or other promotion for, the Co-Branded Application from elsewhere on or off the Excite Network at its sole discretion.
perturbation.changed_text: Excite@Home will provide promotion, if any, for the Co-Branded Application as Excite@Home deems appropriate. Excite@Home holds the sole discretion to promote and link, or choose not to promote and link, the Co-Branded Application from anywhere on or off the Excite Network.
perturbation.explanation: The original implies that Excite@Home will provide promotion per Exhibit F, with the possibility of additional promotion. The modified version implies that Excite@Home can choose not to promote it at all, even if Exhibit F is in place, contradicting the expectation that there will be a minimum level of promotion.
